subject: Football
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sportswriters tried to make sense of a day in which a judge ruled against the N.F.L. lockout and the Grizzlies moved one victory from eliminating the Spurs.
snippet: Sportswriters tried to make sense of a day in which a judge ruled against the N.F.L. lockout and the Grizzlies moved one victory from eliminating the Spurs.
